product_name: Shimano XTR PD-M980 SPD Mountain Bike Pedals
long_description: Shimano XTR PD-M980 SPD mountain bike pedals offer light weight, secure engagement and a stable platform for race-day performance with year-round durability. Dual-sided entry with robust retention claws offers easy entry and exit; adjustable release tension allows for individual customization based on rider preference. New design offers an increased contact area, improving shoe-to-pedal contact, efficiency and feel. Open binding mechanism is designed to shed mud. Stout chromoly spindles ensure lasting use through demanding conditions; pedal body itself covers more of the spindle for even greater performance and durability. The Shimano XTR PD-M980 SPD pedals include pedals, cleats and mounting hardware; fits most shoes with SPD-style 2-hole mounts.
